description_html:
Italian women have long led the world of fashion. Their style is unmistakable. It carries an elegant softness that celebrates the feminine silhouette. Just as in the finest couture design, the ROHL Italian Kitchen Patrizia Pull-Down Kitchen Faucet is beautifully tailored, with a subtle hint of a flirty curve. Slimming details along the spout and on the pull-down handle make this faucet the perfect mix of feminine style and strength.

Authentically crafted in Pemonte, Italy, the Patrizia Pull-Down Kitchen Kitchen Faucet is made from solid brass construction and features a 1/4"-turn ceramic disc control cartridge and a nylon hose. The retractable pull-down metal handspray stays secure with a magnetic docking system and features a dual spray with lock-in modes.

Available Finishes: Polished Chrome, Polished Nickel, Satin Nickel, Tuscan Brass, Inca Brass and Matte Black
product_name: ROHL Italian Patrizia Pull-Down Kitchen Faucet
